constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 叶子节点的值必须是1到k之间的不同整数，每个整数恰好使用一次
constraints.formal: values in leaves are distinct integers from 1 to k, each used exactly once

constraints.name: operation_constraint
constraints.description: 非叶子节点的值由其子节点的值通过指定的操作（max或min）计算得出
constraints.formal: value of non-leaf node v = operation(v.children), where operation is either max or min
